include_example: incl Hydrogen fuel cell, Contemporary Amperex Technology Co Ltd, Cemt Co Ltd (Hydrogen fuel cell)
Eg: Guangdong Jiemeng Intelligent Equipment Co Ltd
incl all sort of battery materials, such as anode material, cathode material, electrolytes, copper foil (if the company state it is solely used in battery), battery management chip etc
Note_internal: For example: there is a copper foil manufacturer saying its copper foil is for general use, we will still put down “Battery Material” for sub-industry, but leave blank for Tech Deal and SRI

include_example: Incl those company that claimed itself as a battery recycler (ignore how the company do with those battery afterwards)
Incl the company that only develop battery-related technology (does not make battery)

exclude_example: energy project that only use Energy storage system but not the manufactuer of Energy storage system

Non-battery example 
- Solar Cell, Solar Panel, 
 - Charging Infrastructure
 - Battery Swapping

Note_internal: Real asset category is usually Energy Transmission and Distribution
Tech deal_note: Generally Non-Tech unless that company is really involve Technology
